      • genBinding

        public int genBinding(MapItem item)
        Create a VAO to represent all instances of the specified structs.MapItem. A Vertex Array Object stores all the calls needed to render a model. Basic LWJGL rendering from https://learnopengl.com/Getting-started/Hello-Triangle
        Parameters:
        item - The structs.MapItem to generate a VAO for.
        Returns:
        The handle to the VAO.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(MapItem instance)
        Register a new structs.MapItem with the game.Game object.
        Parameters:
        instance - The structs.MapItem to register.

      • addInstance

        public MapItemInstance addInstance(org.joml.Vector3f pos,
                                   int id)
        Create a new structs.MapItemInstance and register it with the game.Game object.
        Parameters:
        pos - The location of the instance in 3D world space.
        id - The unique identifer of the structs.MapItem.

      • removeInstance

        public void removeInstance(int id)
        Remove an instance from the list of all instances. The instance should be later cleaned from the instances map.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique ID of the instance.

      • cleanInstance

        public void cleanInstance(int id,
                          int ind)
        Remove an instance from the instances map.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique ID of the MapItem.
        ind - Index in the list value.

      • retrieve

        public MapItem retrieve(MapItemInstance instance)
        Retrieve the structs.MapItem object associated with this instance.
        Parameters:
        instance - The structs.MapItemInstance to retrieve the structs.MapItem for.
        Returns:
        The singleton structs.MapItem that represents all such provided instances.

      • getInstances

        Parameters:

        Returns:
